address.example: The interior of the third crater on the planet Mars.

FilteringRequest.description:
Filtering request via RSQL. Empty filter returns everything. 

Example filter: (endDate>2023-05-05 and endDate<2024-05-08) and name==Jon 

Example sort: id,asc;company.id,desc

usedCurrentYear.description: For display only, no id returned

TimeOffStatus.description: Represents calculated time off status (izin durumu) for an employee.
